elements.name: Creating an agent permission group and assigning it to an agent

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
have added a new business customer with required contact type
have created a new agent permission group
I wish to create agent contact with valid login credentials
the agent permission group should be available for selection under drop down under agentUser creation
I should be able to login with agent credentials

elements.name: creating a reseller with agent permission group

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
have added a new business customer with required contact type
have created a new agent permission group
I wish to create a business reseller contact with valid login credentials
the agent permission group should be available for selection under drop down under business reseller contact creation
I should be able to login with reseller credentials

elements.name: Creating a CP permission group and assigning it a CP

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
Have created a new CP permission group under settings
I wish to create new CP under login users sub-menu
the CP permission should be available for selection under drop down during the CP creation
I should be able to login with CP credentials

elements.name: creating an order quote by logged in as an agent and verifying all required fields are visible on the quote screen

steps.name: I am logged in as agent
Have created a new customer
I access create Quote tab
All required fields pertaining to an agent should be visible on the create quote window
Only the quotes created by me and the ones created for my company should be visible

elements.name: creating an order quote by logged in as a reseller and verifying all required fields are visible on the quote screen

steps.name: I am logged in as reseller
Have created a new customer
I access create Quote tab
All required fields pertaining to a reseller should be visible on the create quote window
Only the quotes created by me and the ones created for companies under my contact list should be visible

elements.name: creating an order quote by logged in as a CP and verifying all required fields are visible on the quote screen

steps.name: I am logged in as CP
I have added a new business customer
I access create Quote tab
All required fields pertaining to a CP should be visible on the create quote window
all the quotes including that of the resellers and agents should be visible

elements.name: Login as an agent, create a business customer and verify the created customer from the company and site drop downs on create quote page

steps.name: I am logged in as agent
Have created a new customer
I access create Quote window
the newly created customer details should appear under the company and site drop downs

elements.name: Login as a CP, create a business customer, assign an agent and create a quote for the customer. when logged in as the agent the created quote should appear on the orders manager

steps.name: I am logged in as an agent after the CP has created a quote for a "businessCustomer" assigned to me
a quote been created for my "businessCustomer" by a CP
I access orders manager
I should not see that particular quote

elements.name: Login as a reseller, create a site and verify the created site from the site drop down on create quote page

steps.name: I am logged in as reseller
have created a new site for a company
I access create Quote tab and select the above company from the company dropdown
The newly created site should appear under the site drop down

elements.name: CP revokes the WLR3 order permissions for an agent so that the WLR3 orders are hidden from the agent when he logs in and vice versa

steps.name: CP has revoked my WLR order permissions
I am logged in as agent
I should not be able to see and edit them
the orders are visible and editable once the CP issues the orders back agent rights

elements.name: CP revokes the WLR3 order permissions for a reseller so that the WLR3 orders are hidden from the reseller when he logs in and vice versa

steps.name: CP has revoked my WLR order permissions
I am logged in as reseller
I should not be able to see and edit them
the orders are visible and editable once the CP issues the orders back reseller rights

name: Granting and Revoking WLR3 permissions for Agent and Reseller

elements.name: Login as a CP, create a quote, add a service and verify the behaviour of CP only control

steps.name: I am logged in as CP
Have created a quote
I add a service from the quote details page
the control that is CP only should be visible

elements.name: Login as an agent, create a quote, add a service and verify the behaviour of CP only control

steps.name: I am logged in as agent
Have created a quote
I add a service from the quote details page
the control that is CP only should be invisible

elements.name: Login as a reseller, create a quote, add a service and verify the behaviour of CP only control

steps.name: I am logged in as reseller
Have created a quote
I add a service from the quote details page
the control that is CP only should be invisible

elements.name: Login as a CP, create a quote, add a service without selecting the mandatory control and check the behaviour

steps.name: I am logged in as CP
Have created a quote
I access quote details and add a service without selecting the mandatory control
The quote should become invalid
When I add the omitted control, the quote should become valid

elements.name: Login as an agent, create a quote, add a service without selecting the mandatory control and check the behaviour

steps.name: I am logged in as agent
Have created a quote
I access quote details and add a service without selecting the mandatory control
The quote should become invalid
When I add the omitted control, the quote should become valid

elements.name: Login as a reseller, create a quote, add a service without selecting the mandatory control and check the behaviour

steps.name: I am logged in as reseller
Have created a quote
I access quote details and add a service without selecting the mandatory control
The quote should become invalid
When I add the omitted control, the quote should become valid

name: order service automation for agent, reseller and CP. includes CP only and mandatory fields under select service.

elements.name: verify that the customer and internal tabs are present and accessible under add/view notes under edit order page

steps.name: I am logged in as CP
I access add_view notes on edit order page
customer and internal tabs should be present and accessible

elements.name: verify the customer and internal tabs are absent under add/view notes under edit order page

steps.name: I am logged in as reseller
I access add_view notes on edit order page
customer and internal tabs should be absent

elements.name: verify the customer and internal tabs are absent under add/view notes under edit order page

steps.name: I am logged in as agent
I access add_view notes on edit order page
customer and internal tabs should be absent

elements.name: assert that an assigned service is unavailable to agent and vice versa

steps.name: I am logged in as agent and there is a service unassigned to me
I access the services page
I should not be able to see that particular service
I should be able to see the service once CP assigns it to me

name: verify customer and internal fields by logging as CP, agent and reseller

elements.name: verify that a charge designated CP only is accessible by CP

steps.name: I am logged in as CP
create a new quote and access a service
the CP only control should be visible and accessible

elements.name: verify that a charge designated CP only is inaccessible by agent

steps.name: I am logged in as agent
create a new quote and access a service
the CP only control should be invisible

elements.name: verify that a charge designated CP only is inaccessible by reseller

steps.name: I am logged in as reseller
create a new quote and access a service
the CP only control should be invisible

name: Accessing controls in services with different permissions (CP, Agent and reseller)

elements.name: laying addOnActivation charge for quote created by CP

steps.name: I am logged in as CP
I create a new quote and add a service with addOnActivation charge
I run SQL query
The charge should be visible in the back end

elements.name: laying addOnActivation charge for quote created by agent

steps.name: I am logged in as agent
I create a new quote and add a service with addOnActivation charge
I run SQL query
The charge should be visible in the back end

elements.name: laying addOnActivation charge for quote created by reseller

steps.name: I am logged in as reseller
I create a new quote and add a service with addOnActivation charge
I run SQL query
The charge should be visible in the back end

name: laying add on activation charge for quote created by CP, agent and reseller

elements.name: Verify that login is successful with valid username and password

steps.name: I am on login page
I enter valid username and password
Login is successful

elements.name: : Login with invalid credentials

steps.name: I am on login page
I enter invalid "john" and "abcdef"
The login should fail

elements.name: Creating a new Business Customer

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
I access add new business customer page
Provide all the required info
A new customer should be successfully created

comments.value: #  Scenario: Creating a sub-site for a newly created customer
#    Given I am logged in as an admin
#    And I have added a new business customer
#    When I access Company Sites under the company menu and provide all the required info
#    Then A new site should appear under the respective company's menu
#  Scenario: Adding invoice details and billing information to a newly created customer
#    Given I am logged in as an admin
#    And   I have added a new business customer
#    When  I access invoicing and billing details section under company menu and provide all required info
#    Then  Invoice details and billing details of that particular customer should be updated, respectively

elements.name: Adding service charges (one off and recurring) and CLI to the newly created customer

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
I have added a new business customer
I access CLIs and service charges section under company menu and provide all required info
CLIs and service charges of that particular customer should be updated, respectively

elements.name: Adding pricing details to a newly created customer

steps.name: I am logged in as an admin
I have added a new business customer
I access pricing details under company menu and provide all required info
Pricing details of that particular customer  should be updated

name: Creating new business customer and assigning all the required inputs to generate an invoice bill
